Tasks.Task Description: Periodically review all NSG rules to ensure they align with current security policies and organizational requirements. Remove any outdated or unnecessary rules.
Analyze NSG flow logs to identify unusual traffic patterns or potential security threats. Ensure logs are stored securely and accessible for compliance purposes.
Verify that NSGs are correctly associated with the intended subnets or network interfaces. Ensure no misconfigurations that could lead to security vulnerabilities.
Maintain up-to-date documentation for all NSG configurations, including rules, associations, and changes. Ensure documentation is accessible to relevant stakeholders.
Conduct regular compliance checks to ensure NSG configurations adhere to organizational and regulatory security standards.
Simulate traffic scenarios to test the effectiveness of NSG rules. Ensure rules are blocking or allowing traffic as intended.
Use Azure Monitor to track the performance and health of NSGs. Investigate and resolve any issues impacting network security or connectivity.
Regularly back up NSG configurations to ensure quick recovery in case of accidental changes or failures.
If NSGs are integrated with services requiring encryption keys, ensure regular rotation of keys to maintain security.
Conduct drills to test the response to NSG-related security incidents. Ensure the team is familiar with procedures for mitigating threats.
